desc: Seminars allow in-depth study of particular themes or topics in psychology. Prerequisite: Psychology 230. See department Web site for descriptions and additional prerequisites. Offered most years. May be repeated if topics are different.
name: Sem: Cognitive Neuro
notes: Students in Psychology 390A must also register for lab Psychology 390 AL
